SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo /* 게시글번호 */ ,BOARD_SE_CD AS boardSeCd /* 게시글구분코드 */ ,BOARD_TTL AS boardTtl /* 게시글제목 */ ,BOARD_CONT AS boardCont /* 게시글내용 */ ,REG_DTM AS regDtm /* 등록일시 */ ,REG_USER_NO AS regUserNo /* 등록사용자번호 */ ,UPD_DTM AS updDtm /* 수정일시 */ ,UPD_USER_NO AS updUserNo /* 수정사용자번호 */ ,BOARD_RFNC_CNT AS boardRfncCnt/* 조회수 */ ,DEL_YN AS delYn /* 삭제여부 */ FROM CM_BOARD /* 게시판T */
AND BOARD_SE_CD = #{boardSeCd} /* 게시글구분코드 */
